chat.title: Event Chatroom
chat.remind: No contact information or advertisements allowed in the public chat room to prevent scams. Violators will be banned!
chat.normalPlaceholder: What do you think of this event?
chat.tooOften: Too many attempts, please try again later.
chat.greaterThanBets: Bet slips with bet amount over {currency} {minBet}
chat.forbiddenWords: Unable to send chat message because it contains forbidden words
chat.sendValidation.currency: To comment, you must make a deposit of {currency} {amount} or above
chat.sendValidation.vip: To comment, you must reach VIP {vip} or above
